## AuthContainer.verifyWithCode() method

Performs user verification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verifyWithCode(code: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  code | <code>string</code> | Verification code sent to user |

<b>Returns:</b>
